Package MOBLIMA

Class CinemaLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • MOBLIMA.CinemaLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    public class CinemaLayout
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Represents the layout of a cinema. Every cinema hall has a specific cinema layout. Seats can be identified by their array index, row/column number or their seat number. Example is array index [0][0] is the same as r = 1, c = 1 and is the same as seat A1.
    Since:
    2019-11-13
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    SS1 Group 2
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private int column
      Number of columns of the cinema layout.
      private int row
      Number of rows of the cinema layout.
      private CinemaSeat[][] seatGrid
      2D array of cinema seat representation of the cinema layout.
